subject: p19549821
History: Chronic cough, evaluation for parenchymal changes.
Findings: The lung volumes are normal. Mild bilateral apical scarring. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette without pulmonary edema. No overt pneumonia. Small basal lung nodule projecting over the right costophrenic sinus, unchanged as compared to the previous examination. No inflammatory or edematous change in the lung parenchyma. Normal appearance of the mediastinum.
